GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
sched/core: Do not requeue task on CPU excluded from cpus_mask

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 302f7b0fc337746f41c69eb08522907f6a90c643, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit c6e7bd7afaeb3af55ffac122828035f1c01d1d7b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: sched/core: Do not requeue task on CPU excluded from cpus_mask
